intro: Cryptocarya ovata, commonly known as the smooth-leaved cryptocarya, is a species of flowering plant in the family Lauraceae. It is native to eastern Australia, particularly found in Queensland and New South Wales. The plant is characterized by its glossy, ovate leaves that are usually smooth and dark green. It produces small, fragrant white flowers followed by spherical, woody fruits. Cryptocarya ovata is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
